title: Analysis of Determinants in Corporate Restructuring Capabilities: Multilayered Collaboration and Learning Strategies [K-12]

context.prior_knowledge: Basic knowledge of organizational management and corporate strategy, foundational data analysis skills
context.additional_context: Learners practice survey design/analysis in BYOD environments, utilizing real corporate case data

learning_goals: The impact of internal/external organizational collaborations (partners, departments, teams) on restructuring capabilities can be empirically analyzed.
The influence of individual/group/organizational learning strategies on knowledge recombination capabilities can be evaluated.
Determinants of restructuring capabilities can be derived by statistically processing survey-based data.
difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
